definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: When more than half of my life, experienced a lot of wind and rain, can understand this story.
sentences.chinese: 当我人生过半，经历了一番风雨后，才懂了这故事。

sentences.english: Will you mind come back in half an hour?
sentences.chinese: 请您过半小时再来行吗？

sentences.english: It takes a simple majority of representatives’ votes to impeach an official.
sentences.chinese: 弹劾案的通过只需要过半众议员投赞成票。

sentences.english: Almost all of the animals and more than half of the higher plants are diploid.
sentences.chinese: 几乎全部的动物和过半数的高等植物都是二倍体。

sentences.english: More than half the workers and staff members in this mill are women.
sentences.chinese: 这个工厂过半数的职工是妇女。

sentences.english: The board of supervisors shall have one chairman who is to be elected by more than half of all the supervisors.
sentences.chinese: 监事会设主席一人，由全体监事过半数选举产生。

sentences.english: The first group will consist of 600 people and currently the number of applicants has exceeded 300.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜游首发团定员600人，目前报名人数已经过半。

sentences.english: More than a quarter lost more than half of their wealth.
sentences.chinese: 超过四分之一的家庭损失了过半的家庭财富。

sentences.english: He is over fifty now, but he is in good health.
sentences.chinese: 他已经年过半百，可是身体健康。

sentences.english: Over half of patients with renal failure or liver disease also suffer from it.
sentences.chinese: 过半数的肾衰竭和肝病病人也会得上慢性骚痒。

sentences.english: Lee is passing the half-way point of his single term without much to show in accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 李明博的首个任期已经过半，但却建树不多。

sentences.english: More than half of all deaths occurred among the 20- to 49-year-old age group.
sentences.chinese: 其中过半数的死者年龄在20到49岁之间。

sentences.english: Life is half spent before we know what it is!
sentences.chinese: 生命过半，才能悟出人生的真谛。

sentences.english: Currently, more than half of the world’s new elevators are being installed in China.
sentences.chinese: 目前，世界上过半的新升降机是在中国装置的。

sentences.english: The first group will consist of 600 people and currently the number of applicants has surpassed half.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜游首发团定员600人，目前报名人数已经过半。

sentences.english: Over half of its main body has been finished and it's supposed to be completed at the end of this year.
sentences.chinese: 学工苑的主体建造也已过半，预计年底前完工。
